attributes.action: Parliament and Politicians in UK need to Change
attributes.additional_details:
Over the last 20 plus years we have seen scandal after scandal, affair after affair and fiddle after fiddle in our Parliamentary system in the UK.

We the people must now demand that Parliament be reformed and the number of MP’s be reduced to 400 and that they be paid £125,000 per annum and they can have Travel Warrants from London to constituency and return.

We also need to provide one central block of accommodation that can sleep 400 near enough to access Westminster either by tube, bus or taxi.

Parliament’s hours should then be set at 10 am until 6pm 5 days a week All MP’s must attend during those hours for 3 days in a week the other 2 days they can have to do constituency business.

No MP can have outside jobs or consultancies or directorships.

We need to put up an Independent Candidate to stand in each constituency who will attest to the above and will agree that when elected the changes needed in our Parliamentary system will happen.
